jol.core
Class Driver

java.lang.Object
  jol.core.Driver
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The main driver loop that executes query objects Query.

Nested Class Summary
static class Driver.Evaluator
          Table function represents the query processor that evaluates tuples using the query objects install by the runtime programs.
static class Driver.Flusher
          A table function that flushes TupleSet objects to the respective tables.
static interface Driver.Task
          Tasks are used to inject tuples into the schedule.

Method Detail

runtime

public void runtime(Program runtime)
Set the runtime program.

Parameters:
runtime - The runtime program.

task

public void task(Driver.Task task)
Add a task to the task queue. This will be evaluated on the next clock tick.

Parameters:
task - The task to be added.

run

public void run()
The main driver loop. The loop is responsible for 1. updating the clock 2. scheduling tasks. Driver algorithm: loop forever { update to new clock value; evaluate (insertion of clock value); evaluate (all tasks); evaluate (deletion of clock value); }

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
